task.title: Take Snapshot of Media
task.shortdesc: Take a snapshot of linked media at the current viewpoint.

taskbody.context: From the Media Player view, with media open:

step.cmd: Click on the arrow to the bottom right of your media and choose the Take snapshot option from the context menu.
step.stepresult: A Save As window will appear.

step.cmd: Choose a file name and destination directory for your snapshot and click Save.
step.stepresult: An image of the current frame of your media will be created in the specified location.The image will have the same dimensions as the original video file; the size of the video in the Media Player view is irrelevant.
